entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Laramie County through 430 PM MDT... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crystal Lake Campground, or 19 miles west of Cheyenne, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail.
